description: Learn Python programming from scratch with hands-on exercises and projects. Suitable for absolute beginners.
Master the essential technologies and skills required for modern web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more.
Explore data science concepts and techniques using the R programming language. Suitable for both beginners and intermediate learners.
Build cross-platform mobile applications using Google's Flutter framework. No prior mobile development experience required.
Get started with Java programming language and learn basic concepts, syntax, and object-oriented programming principles.
Become proficient in both front-end and back-end JavaScript development, including frameworks like React and Node.js.
Dive into the world of machine learning and AI using Python. Learn popular libraries like TensorFlow and scikit-learn.
Gain foundational knowledge in cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, and ethical hacking techniques.
Learn to build native mobile apps for iOS and Android using the React Native framework.
